claims.object: Converting rotary motion to linear motion

surface_layer.definition: A screw used to convert rotary motion into linear motion.

deep_layer.mechanism: Rotation of the screw causes linear movement of a nut along the screw's axis.
deep_layer.origin: Mechanical design for precise linear actuation.

epistemic_metadata.source: Rotary to Linear Motion: The Ultimate Guide for Engineers
citations: Rotary to Linear Motion: The Ultimate Guide for Engineers
